consultations.title: Emerge: Emerging Athlete Development
consultations.description: Custom programs for young athletes, focusing on skill mastery, nutrition, and injury prevention.

consultations.title: Emerging Athlete Development
consultations.intro: High-quality physiotherapy and rehabilitation support for individuals of all ages following injury or surgery.
consultations.details: Using the latest rehabilitation techniques and equipment, our expert team will help you achieve the best outcome.
consultations.idealFor: Young athletes looking to develop skills and prevent injuries.

consultations.title: ACL Rehabilitation
consultations.subtitle: Rehabilitation Packages
consultations.description: Comprehensive rehabilitation from pre-surgery through to full recovery, including non-surgical routes.
consultations.details: Bespoke packages tailored to individual needs, working closely with surgeons and health providers. Book an initial physiotherapy appointment to start.
consultations.extra: Specializing in ACL rehabilitation with decades of experience in professional sport, supporting 15-20 individuals at any time.
consultations.podcastText: Listen to our podcast episode on ACL recovery by searching 'GoPerform Podcast' (episode 12) or below:
consultations.idealFor: Athletes recovering from ACL or other orthopedic surgeries.

consultations.title: Rehab Membership
consultations.description: Daily access to facilities and staff for optimal injury recovery.
features: Weekly soft tissue and manual therapy treatment
Weekly strength and conditioning sessions with our coaches
Daily access to GoPerform for rehabilitation
Use of specialist equipment including AlterG, GameReady, Normatec, and Altitude training
consultations.idealFor: Individuals aiming for a full return to sports through comprehensive support.

consultations.title: Elevate: Pro Athlete Development
consultations.description: Elite training for top athletes, pushing performance with advanced techniques and mental conditioning.

consultations.title: Pro Athlete Assessment
consultations.details: Comprehensive assessment of physical and mental performance to create a tailored training plan.
consultations.idealFor: Professional athletes seeking to optimize their performance.

consultations.title: Pro Training Program
consultations.details: Monthly coaching, advanced training sessions, and mental conditioning for elite performance.
consultations.idealFor: Top athletes aiming for competitive excellence.

consultations.title: VO2 Max Enhancement
consultations.description: Skyrocket your endurance with programs designed to boost cardiovascular efficiency and stamina.

consultations.title: VO2 Max Test
consultations.details: Measure your aerobic capacity with a detailed report and training recommendations.
consultations.idealFor: Athletes looking to improve endurance and stamina.

consultations.title: Endurance Training Program
consultations.details: Monthly VO2 Max tests, weekly training sessions, and personalized endurance plans.
consultations.idealFor: Runners, cyclists, or triathletes aiming for peak cardiovascular performance.
